timeline.bodyText: Add domain filter for sequence field
timeline.author: vbh-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,8 +17,15 @@
   			<field name="validatePaymentByDepositSlipPublication" showIf="inOutSelect == 1 && [5, 7].indexOf(typeSelect) >= 0" if="__config__.app.getApp('account')?.paymentVouchersOnInvoice" />
 		</panel>
 		<panel-tabs name="mainPanelTab">
-	        <panel-related name="accountManagementListPanel" field="accountManagementList" grid-view="account-management-payment-mode-grid" form-view="account-management-form"
-		        domain="self.typeSelect = 3" colSpan="12" if-module="axelor-account" if="__config__.app.isApp('account')" />
+	        <panel-related name="accountManagementListPanel"  field="accountManagementList" editable="true" form-view="account-management-form" domain="self.typeSelect = 3" 
+		     onNew="action-account-management-record-default, action-account-management-attrs-type" colSpan="12" if-module="axelor-account" if="__config__.app.isApp('account')" >
+				<field name="company" form-view="company-form" grid-view="company-grid" onChange="action-group-account-account-management-onchange-common"
+		    		canEdit="false" if="__config__.app.getApp('base').getEnableMultiCompany()"/>
+    			<field name="cashAccount" form-view="account-form" grid-view="account-grid" domain="self.company = :company AND self.accountType.technicalTypeSelect = 'cash'" canEdit="false"/>
+    			<field name="journal" form-view="journal-form" grid-view="journal-grid" canEdit="false"/>
+    			<field name="bankDetails" form-view="bank-details-form" grid-view="bank-details-grid" canEdit="false"/>
+		  		<field name="sequence" form-view="sequence-form" grid-view="sequence-grid"/>
